name: Chef Mao
title: Chef Mao, Ingenious Gourmet
desc: "We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."

attributes.source: Reward for accepting Chef Mao's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
After playing a Food Event Card: Create 1 random Basic Elemental Die (once per Round).
After playing a Food Event Card: Draw 1 random Food Event Card from your deck (once per match).
